title: An Act requiring the disclosure of consumer information related to tariffs

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Domb of Amherst, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Mindy Domb relative to the disclosure of consumer information related to tariffs.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
